entry.title: So Pick Me, Choose Me, Top Me
entry.summary:
Author: brsfic

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,666Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 93

Summary: Stiles just wanted one thing: a quiet night, some alone time, and DomTop69 to take care of his chronic case of blue balls. What he got instead was murder, missing organs, and Derek Hale crashing through his hookup like an overprotective sourwolf-shaped wrecking ball. Now there are dead bodies piling up in Beacon Hills, Stiles’ crush is way too obvious to every werewolf in a five-mile radius, and apparently? Derek may have considered snapping his hot Grindr date's neck with his werewolf claws. It’s messy, it’s dangerous, it’s infuriating, and Stiles can’t stop himself from diving headfirst into the chaos. Typical. A casefic full of supernatural mystery, sarcastic banter, Grindr disasters, Derek’s terrible timing, Stiles Stilinski’s very inconvenient feelings, and blue balls so blue Stiles might star as the Blues Clues' new host.

entry.title: Crown of Forget-Me-Not's
entry.summary:
Author: CozyEarth

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,854Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Grief is a funny thing.It hits everyone differently and presents itself in many different forms.They say that there are five stages of grief, but for Stiles, they all ended with him crying.Stiles always hated the crying.Sorrowful tears that would make him spiral into despair. Hatefully angry tears that burned his eyes and fueled his sharp tongue. Happy tears that washed over a wave of melancholy.Stiles hated it every single time.Because when Stiles cried, it was all consuming. -Losing a parent hurts.Even when it's years later.Even when the world gets turned on its head, the supernatural is real, and your best friend leaves you to the wolves for a girl.Literally!Stiles knows he has a lot to work through, but everything keeps piling up.What will be the breaking point?And will he allow himself to ask for help?

entry.title: The Bonds that Bind
entry.summary:
Author: applejuice382

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 199,852Chapters: 16/21Kudos: 883

Summary: Stiles is just trying to prevent the next supernatural problem from killing his friends. Derek is just trying to keep his pack alive (and ignore the desperation that crawls under his skin whenever Stiles is near). When Stiles goes into the preserve to investigate a string of murders, he and Derek are kidnapped by an unknown group and locked in a basement with no escape. Each night brings new suffering, and each day they have only each other. The two will have to learn how to lean on one another to keep their sanity intact, and they’ll have to work together to escape. Too bad they annoy the shit out of each other.

entry.title: Copain of the black wolf.
entry.summary:
Author: EverythingRara

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 195,943Chapters: 23/40Kudos: 706

Summary: A Sterek rewrite of the show, that stays mostly canon compliant in the beginning, shown exclusively through the eyes of Stiles Stilinski, unknown soul mate of Derek Hale.Starts slow emotionally, my first attempt at a story of this degree please be gentle.Stiles grunted softly as he heaved himself onto the roof, his sneakers scuffing against the shingles. Scott—his best friend since forever—wasn’t answering his phone, and Stiles couldn’t wait. There was no way Scott was going to believe what Stiles had just overheard.Keeping low, Stiles crept along the roof toward Scott’s window, his heart racing as the cool night air pressed against his skin. He tried the window, but it wouldn’t budge—it was locked.“Of course it’s locked,” he muttered under his breath, rolling his eyes.Knocking softly on the glass, he leaned in closer, squinting to peer inside. The curtains were drawn, giving him only a hazy, distorted view of the room beyond. “Scott,” he hissed, rapping on the window again. No answer.Suddenly, the curtains shifted, and the window flung open. Scott and Stiles screamed, startling each other.

entry.title: From Surrogate to Mate: Trust, Loyalty, and Love
entry.summary:
Author: Foxywho93

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,424Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 105

Summary: What started out as a surrogacy contract, turned into something more. A story about trust, loyalty, family, pack… and danger. Stiles Stilinski didn’t expect his life to collapse all at once — losing school, his apartment, even the Jeep that reminded him of his parents. Homeless, broke, and desperate, he walked into Woodland Grove Surrogacy Agency with nothing left to lose. He only wanted a chance to survive. Derek Hale came to the agency looking for someone strong enough to carry his pup. He didn’t expect his instincts to lock on the sarcastic, exhausted human with too-thin wrists and too-bright eyes. But his wolf knew immediately: Stiles was the one. Now Stiles is pulled into the Hale estate — into a world of warmth, loyalty, and pack — a world that insists he belongs even as he struggles to believe it. But whispers turn into threats, and danger follows close behind. Because sometimes fate doesn’t just hand you family. Sometimes it throws you into it claws-first.

Author: Lalaith_Quetzalli

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,829Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 61

Summary: It’s not been easy, living such a life, all the secrets, all the lies. But Stiles did it because he had to, for himself, for his family, his pack. He’s learned, he’s traveled, he’s fought, done everything he’s had to. Now comes the time for the hardest part, and perhaps (hopefully) the most rewarding. It’s all come down to this… (Sequel to The Tunnel)
